name: Mitigation Playbook for Remote Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook mitigates an attack involving the remote execution of scripts via PowerShell on compromised hosts.

parallel--02c85f8d-a2c5-4b9f-930b-849ebd.name: Mitigation Actions Parallel Execution
parallel--02c85f8d-a2c5-4b9f-930b-849ebd.description: Execute parallel mitigation actions such as killing malicious processes and blocking external IPs.

action--442f1be5-93b0-425f-9d6e-c7f56ed1.name: Kill malicious process
action--442f1be5-93b0-425f-9d6e-c7f56ed1.description: Terminate processes related to the detected malware.

decision--1e5c0f1d-ef62-4b31-ad69-a3856c.name: Check if connection to external IP is detected

action--5e476ef5-6738-4a82-bc89-3ad3879b.name: Block external IP
action--5e476ef5-6738-4a82-bc89-3ad3879b.description: Block network connections to a suspicious external IP.

action--498dcbf7-4ad9-4c99-abc8-3dee5cf1.name: Isolate compromised host
action--498dcbf7-4ad9-4c99-abc8-3dee5cf1.description: Disconnect the compromised host from the network if deemed compromised.

loop--3bd57485-ccf4-411f-be06-9b38e558d7.name: Scan Loop
loop--3bd57485-ccf4-411f-be06-9b38e558d7.description: Continuously scan all connected hosts until no threats are detected.

action--acdeba25-ae43-4b7e-a8fd-ffb4555b.name: Scan all connected hosts for additional threats
action--acdeba25-ae43-4b7e-a8fd-ffb4555b.description: Perform a scan using ClamAV to detect and remove threats.

action--cfb2374e-5753-4d6f-b8f5-362d20f4.name: Reset passwords for compromised account
action--cfb2374e-5753-4d6f-b8f5-362d20f4.description: Reset passwords for any user accounts that may have been compromised.
